title: Voyageurs National Park: Campgrounds
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Campgrounds              Campgrounds         View from Woodenfrog Campground toward Kabetogama Lake. NPS/Matt Holly  There are no "drive-to" campgrounds in Voyageurs National Park.   Just outside of the park are the Minnesota Department of Natural Resources campgrounds:   The 61-site Woodenfrog State Forest Campground on Kabetogama Lake The 8-site Ash River Campground on Ash River  Information on nearby private campgrounds is available in our park newspaper or head over to the drive-to camping in gateway communities page.    See our camping page for information about camping in one of over 200 designated "boat-in" campsites.
